name: FNF Phantasm but it's Beautiful
description: This was just a little project I had in my spare time. Also, it's on a new engine that I found, so I have a good feeling that not very many people have talked about what engine the mod's on. Anyway, it's basically Phantasm, but I remixed the instrumental to make it sound just GORGEOUS. I also added Som cool effects and stuff. Anyway, I hope you enjoy!
